dt: {bc}a political follower whose support is chiefly for personal advantage
{bc}a squire or page to a person of high rank

et: Middle English {it}henshman, hengestman{/it} groom, from {it}hengest{/it} stallion (from Old English) + {it}man{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}hengist{/it} gelding
shortdef: a trusted follower : a right-hand man
a political follower whose support is chiefly for personal advantage
